title: 材质是放在哪的？~~~
txt_content: 材质示放在哪的？      求回答{:10_512:}

replies.author: 1123fff
replies.txt_content:
楼主问的是PE版MC的材质
还是PC版的MC的材质放在哪里?

replies.author: eebill
replies.txt_content:
PE http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... hlight=%B2%C4%D6%CA
PC需要放到.minecraft/resourcepacks 进游戏点材质包选择即可

replies.author: ever-lose
replies.txt_content:

replies.author: gtt80000
replies.txt_content: 真心挖空了一座山都没挖到钻石啊！
